page.title: 09Transport in Pitsea.
page.content: BUSES There are alot of bus services which run through Pitsea. Many of the bus services run to Basildon town centre.Services also run to Southend and Romford.Many bus services start at Pitsea railway station and alot of buses run through Pitsea Broadway.Tesco's the superstore also runs a free bus on certain days. RAILWAY At Pitsea railway station trains go to London and Southend.There is another line which runs to Tilbury. ROADS The roads in Pitsea are very busy. Partly this is because of the shops and the market.The A13 is also a very congested road which passes through our area. By a group from Pitsea Junior School.
